data.name: Idle Champions - Founder's Pack IV
data.detailed_description:
This EPIC Founder's Pack is packed full of exclusive content, rare buffs, and premium content to begin adventuring deep into the Forgotten Realms!
This Founder’s Pack includes:

42 Gold Chests
5 guaranteed Shiny loot cards
Exclusive Familiar (Campestri)
Exclusive Skin for Calliope (Witchlight Calliope)
5000 Gems
2 Epic Potions of Fire Breath
2 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
2 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
2 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts
2 Epic Bounty Contracts
Exclusive Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter - A single-use potion that increases boss gem drops 50% for 1 week.
1 Epic Golden Potion - Upgrades a Champion equipment item to Golden Epic, granting it 100% more power than its epic form!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 120 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
